LanguageData.TwitchToolkitOauthWarning: Warning: Do not show this code to your stream
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitStartingBalance: How many coins will viewers start with?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitCoinInterval: How many minutes between each coin reward?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitCoinAmount: How many coins given to viewers per interval?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitMinimumPurchasePrice: Minimum amount of coins to spend when purchasing items?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitGiftingCoins: Are viewers able to gift each other coins? (exploitable)
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitWhisperAllowed: Allow viewers to whisper commands to {first}?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitWhisperOnly: Require viewers whisper all commands to {first}?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitPurchaseConfirmations: Enable feedback messages to confirm purchases?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitRepeatViewerNames: Re-use viewer names during purchased raids/aid? (Recommended to have RuntimeGC)
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitMinifiableBuildings: Include items that shouldn't be included in the item list?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitEarningCoins: Reward viewers set coin amount per interval?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitStartingKarma: What karma amount should new viewers start with?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitKarmaCap: What is the maximum amount of karma viewers can have?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitBanViewersWhoAreBad: Should viewers be stopped from having negative karma?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitKarmaReqsForGifting: Enforce Requirements to receive and send coin gifts?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitMinKarmaForGifts: Minimum amount of karma a viewer needs to receive coin gifts
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitMinKarmaSendGifts: Minimum amount of karma a viewer needs to send coin gifts
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitGoodKarma: Good Karma Events/Items - Lower is more
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitNeutralKarma: Neutral Karma Events - Lower is more
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitBadKarma: Bad Karma Events - Lower is more taken
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitVoteTime: How long should viewers have to vote for events?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitVoteOptions: Maximum amount of vote options generated
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitVotingWindow: Show voting window for new votes
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitCommandsModsEnabled: Allow users to use mod list command? !installedmods
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitChatReqsForCoins: Only reward viewers who participate in chat?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitTimeBeforeHalfCoins: How many minutes before lurkers earn half the coin rate?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitTimeBeforeNoCoins: How long before they earn no coins?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitMaxEventsLimit: Limit the amount of events by type?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitMaxEventsPeriod: How long do you want cooldown periods to last?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitEventsHaveCooldowns: Limit the the times individual events can be used?
LanguageData.TwitchToolkitEventCooldownInterval: How long do you want individual event cooldowns to last?
